items.sentence: Tom left at 2:30, so he should\'ve arrived in Boston by now.
Tom doesn\'t know the difference between wine and champagne.
Tom doesn\'t want his parents to find out that he was drunk.
Tom found Christmas presents hidden under his parents\' bed.
Mary is only taller than Tom when she\'s wearing high heels.
You know as well as I do that Tom isn\'t a very good singer.
You\'d better examine the contract carefully before signing.
All Tom wanted was for Mary to learn to get along with John.
Do you think you could convince Tom to volunteer to do that?
It\'s not such a big problem. You\'re worrying way too much.
